column4: So I'm currently getting internet on my computer via my Droid; anyone think it'd be pushing the network any if I were to upgrade to 10.04? 2 GB over a 3G network?
actually, this connection is pretty damn fast for a phone, over 1 Mbps
Verizon, actually.  Mostly what I'm worried about is getting a call from them saying "Yeah...don't do that.  Too much."
